english.segment1: Hello friend, it's been sometime. Since I've sat at your table, and drank your wine. Worldly lies, empty skies. But only you can satisfy
english.segment2: Can I be somebody? Not what they want me to be. Just a pale reflection of what you want me to be
english.segment3: Sticks and stones, skin and bones. My teflon coat is wearing thin. Worldly wise, synthesised. I'm on the outside looking in
english.segment4: Can I be somebody? Not what they want me to be. Just a pale reflection of what you want me to be. That's what I'm gonna be. Can I be somebody? Can I be somebody?. I'm gonna be somebody
english.segment5: I know one day, I will be free. My cynical clothing, will fall from me. Flying high in the blink of an eye. Mezzamorphisy
